ygData.subject: RE: Re: RE: Sol Ro Temple Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: she is talking about Guard McCluskey right?  for some reason, this guard HATES bards, he hangs out in the tower i think to the south (i don t know the area
ygData.messageBody:
she is talking about Guard McCluskey right? for some reason, this guard
HATES bards, he hangs out in the tower i think to the south (i don't know
the area either). he is a corrupt qeynos guard, i think in the 30ish
levels? other than killing him for faction, i don't know of any quest.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> Funny, I met a NPC Bard in Qhills the other day. I had never
> noticed her
> before (as I am a wood elf, never spent much time there) I hailed her
> and she reponded something like "Hello Uldar, I must warn you
> if you are
> a fellow bard you won't make any profits with Lt. Soandso around" (no
> brackets, can't remember Lt's name). When I responded "who is Lt.
> Soandso" she responded "I will say no more on this matter"
>
> I was in the middle of something, and I assumed that if I
> ever found out
> what she was talking about and it turned out to be a quest I
> would get
> a rusty weapon and 2cp for my trouble, so I left. BTW, she
> considered me
> Kindy, so not a faction problem.
>
> Anyone know anything about this wandering bard of Qhills?
